text: LIVE UPDATES | CONCLUDED Last Updated: Feb. 23, 2024 at 6:09 PM EST Updated 27 days ago By Adam Clark Nvidia was climbing again on Friday after a surge the previous day triggered by bumper earnings. The chip maker is the toast of Wall Street but UBS analyst Timothy Arcuri broke with the trend and lowered his price target on the stock. NVIDIA Corp.
